blogPost.excerpt: Unstack's content platform now allows you to set up one-time and subscription payments as well as launch membership sites with granular page-level access controls for users. Turn your digital content into a money-making machine using Unstack and Stripe.
blogPost.body: Unstack's content platform now allows you to set up one-time and subscription payments as well as launch membership sites with granular page-level access controls for users. Turn your digital content into a money-making machine using Unstack and Stripe.
blogPost.title: Unstack Payments - eCommerce landing pages and membership sites
blogPost.author: Grant Deken

localize.description: Unstack的内容平台现在允许你设置一次性和订阅支付，以及推出会员网站，为用户提供细粒度的页面级访问控制。将您的数字内容变成一台赚钱的机器，使用Unstack and Strike(解栈和条带)。
localize.tagline: 电子商务登录页面和会员网站

localize.description: Unstack的內容平臺現在允許你設置一次性和訂閱支付，以及推出會員網站，爲用戶提供細粒度的頁面級訪問控制。將您的數字內容變成一臺賺錢的機器，使用Unstack and Strike(解棧和條帶)。
localize.tagline: 電子商務登錄頁面和會員網站

previous.excerpt: Statusly is a Slack bot that helps you automate your Slack status and DND/away settings with Powerful Routines. Sync your Google Calendar and Zoom Meetings with your custom routines. For more information visit https://statusly.app/.
previous.title: Statusly - Automate Slack status, DND based on your daily routines 🤖

localize.description: Statusly是一款松弛机器人，它通过功能强大的例程帮助您自动执行松弛状态和免打扰/离开设置。将您的Google日历和缩放会议与您的自定义例程同步。欲了解更多信息，请访问https://statusly.app/.。
localize.tagline: 根据您的日常工作🤖自动执行闲置状态和免打扰

localize.description: Statusly是一款鬆弛機器人，它通過功能強大的例程幫助您自動執行鬆弛狀態和免打擾/離開設置。將您的Google日曆和縮放會議與您的自定義例程同步。欲瞭解更多信息，請訪問https://statusly.app/.。
localize.tagline: 根據您的日常工作🤖自動執行閒置狀態和免打擾

next.excerpt: Become a certified email marketing expert with this flexible online learning platform. Join the MailerLite Academy, a series of free video courses that let you learn at your own pace. Designed for both beginners and advanced email marketers. See you in class!
next.title: Email Marketing Academy from MailerLite - Learning platform for email marketing expert certification

localize.description: 借助这个灵活的在线学习平台，成为经过认证的电子邮件营销专家。加入MailerLite学院，这是一系列免费视频课程，让您按照自己的节奏学习。专为初学者和高级电子邮件营销者设计。课堂上见！
localize.tagline: 电子邮件营销专家认证学习平台

localize.description: 藉助這個靈活的在線學習平臺，成爲經過認證的電子郵件營銷專家。加入MailerLite學院，這是一系列免費視頻課程，讓您按照自己的節奏學習。專爲初學者和高級電子郵件營銷者設計。課堂上見！
localize.tagline: 電子郵件營銷專家認證學習平臺
